subject: Invoice for December
body: Please find attached invoice #1234 for December billing.

subject: Quick question: API usage
body: Can you show me an example of how to call the API?

subject: FREE MONEY!!! Click here
body: You won a lottery. Click here to claim.

subject: Meeting invite: Project kickoff
body: I'd like to schedule a kickoff meeting next week.

subject: Re: minor bug
body: Hi, the widget errors when I press the button. Can you help?

subject: Unsubscribe from newsletter
body: Click unsubscribe to stop these emails.

subject: Legal: contract changes
body: Please review the attached contract changes.

subject: FYI: weekly stats
body: No action needed, just sending the weekly report.

subject: How do I reset my password?
body: I forgot my password — can you help me reset it?

subject: Limited time offer
body: Buy now and save 50%

subject: Do you have bandwidth for a quick call?
body: Can you hop on a 15-min call today?

subject: Contract amendment
body: We updated section 3. Please review and confirm.

subject: Password changed
body: Your password was recently changed. If this wasn't you, contact support.

subject: Quick: where are the logs?
body: Could you point me to the server logs for yesterday?

subject: Save 30% today only
body: Limited time offer just for you — buy now.

subject: Re-schedule meeting
body: I need to reschedule our 2pm meeting to next week.

subject: Question about billing charges
body: Why was I charged twice this month?

subject: You won a prize
body: Claim your prize now! Click here.

subject: Please review PR #42
body: Could you take a look at PR #42 and approve?

subject: How to set up the SDK?
body: Can you send setup steps for the SDK?

subject: FW: client complaint
body: Forwarding a client escalation — please advise.

subject: Thanks!
body: Thanks for the help earlier — no action needed.

subject: Work from home pills
body: Buy now to improve productivity.

subject: Can you approve the budget?
body: Please approve the Q1 budget attached.

subject: Small doc fix
body: Can you update the docs with the new endpoint?

subject: Meeting minutes
body: Attached are the minutes from today's meeting.

subject: Unable to login
body: I can't access my account, can you reset it?

subject: Weekly digest
body: Here's your weekly digest. Unsubscribe here.

subject: Security incident report
body: We've detected suspicious activity; please review immediately.

subject: Follow up: onboarding
body: Following up to see if you need any onboarding help.
